QuestData.Title: Cannonball!
QuestData.Description: Largo and his minions have been stealing our supplies ever since we setup camp here. It's frustrating to say the least.$b$bWe have heard reports that he is stockpiling cannonballs in the towers overlooking the water up on his overlook. Can you head up there and try to recover some of them for us?$b$b$n, don't forget to keep a watch out for horde too.
QuestData.LogDescription: You need to recover 4 Stacks of Cannonballs from Largo's Overlook for Sergeant Gray. You can find Largo's Overlook just northeast of the base camp.
